theme_fields.name: header
theme_fields.value:
<script type="text/discourse-plugin" version="0.2">
api.decorateWidget('header-icons:before', helper => {
    const showExtraInfo = helper.attrs.minimized;
        if(!showExtraInfo) {
            return helper.h('div#toprow-links', [
                helper.h('a#test1', {
                    href:'https://www.discoursehosting.com/', 
                    text:'Link #1'
                }),
                helper.h('a#test2', {
                    href:'https://www.discoursehosting.com/', 
                    text:'Link #2'
                })
            ]);
        }
});
</script>

theme_fields.name: scss
